page.title: 18CRAIG'S LEISURE TIME
page.content: As a 12 year old boy, most of my leisure time is either after school or at the weekend.On most school days I have about 2\ hours for leisure after school.Some of this time is taken up with{Brass Band}and{piano}practice,and {Surf Club}(all taking place in Bude). In summer I help a farmer bale his hay and sometimes run shopping errands for old people.I also go swimming at{ {Summerleaze Beach}and go on cycle rides with my Dad. In winter I play more on my micro computer with games such as{Bruce Lee, {Lunar Jet Man,}and Jet Set Willy.If it snows, I use my sledge down the hill near my home, but this is not very often because winters are mild.I tend to watch much{television}but also play board games such as{Monopoly and {Cluedo}with my older brother and relations.
